channel.title: Npc noclip
channel.description:
Is there anyway to stop npcs from nocliping?
And i don't want answers like maybe, or i don't think so, i want a yes or no, and if yes how?

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“noobspure50, post:10, topic:318596”]Yes there is a way to stop the noclipping, Im not sure how there might be a tutorial for it somewhere :)[/quote][quote=“Kihomura, post:11, topic:318596”]Yes it is possible to fix it, but you, of all people can’t.[/quote]thanks noobspure50, and i guess thanks Kihomura…
that was all i was looking for a yes or a no.

a mod can lock this now.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Yes it is possible to fix it, but you, of all people can’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

Yes there is a way to stop the noclipping, Im not sure how there might be a tutorial for it somewhere

Read full topic

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

[quote=“watch n lern, post:5, topic:318596”][quote author=iKapa link=topic=415057.msg3055034#msg3055034 date=1260392261]

There might be.
[/quote]what you cant read? or are you trying to get your post count up?

Shit man, relax. Don’t say cant read cos one day you’ll say it do a dyslexic person.

Dyslexic people can read, they just get the letters mixed up. Thats why they are a little slower at reading.

@on topic : There is no way to stop them from noclipping in walls, just make em stand still instead of having moving npcs. If you have moving npcs make sure they enough space to rome around.[/quote]

I know dyslexic people can read, I know a dyslexic. He occasionally says things wrong because he gets the letters mixed up. He comes up with very creative words though.

Read full topic

item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Have this penetrate that thick skull of yours. “Politeness costs nothing”

Read full topic

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:6, topic:318596”][quote author=jj0001 link=topic=415057.msg3055029#msg3055029 date=1260392060]

There might be.
[/quote]what you cant read? or are you trying to get your post count up?

You’re the one asking for help. Try asking politely.[/quote]i did i asked the question then i posted [quote=“jj0001, post:1, topic:318596”]And i don’t want answers like maybe, or i don’t think so, i want a yes or no, and if yes how?[/quote]then you post this post[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:318596”]There might be.[/quote]and last i looked that was a maybe and in my post i said i dont want a maybe.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc noclip
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“iKapa, post:4, topic:318596”][quote author=jj0001 link=topic=415057.msg3055029#msg3055029 date=1260392060]

There might be.
[/quote]what you cant read? or are you trying to get your post count up?

Shit man, relax. Don’t say cant read cos one day you’ll say it do a dyslexic person.[/quote]

Dyslexic people can read, they just get the letters mixed up. Thats why they are a little slower at reading.

@on topic : There is no way to stop them from noclipping in walls, just make em stand still instead of having moving npcs. If you have moving npcs make sure they enough space to rome around.

Read full topic
